rules_text:
First strike
Whenever Tovalar deals combat damage to a player, transform him.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Tovalar.
rules_text2:
Double strike
At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Tovalar.
